:::{.callout-note collapse="false" title="Abstract"}
We have demonstrated a spectral beam combining system based on a frequency comb-based seed source to get high output power from a single laser module. We have also shown that our system can achieve 58{\%} SBS threshold improvement via line shaping the spectrum.
:::
